description: '''Ann-Kristin''' "'''Kikki'''" '''Danielsson''' (born 10 May 1952) is a Swedish [[country music|country]], [[dansband]] and pop singer. Sometimes, she also plays the [[accordion]] and she has also written some lyrics. She has gained notice for [[yodeling]] in some songs. Danielsson gained her largest popularity in the [[Nordic countries|Nordic region]] from the late 1970s until the late 1990s. She also gained popularity at the US country stage during the 1980s. In 1986, she had the "Kikki i Nashville" TV show.
